scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run python manage.py runserver 5050
scripts.install:all: bun run install:backend && bun run install:frontend
scripts.migrate: cd backend && uv run python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: cd backend && uv run python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.seed: cd backend && uv run python manage.py seed
